00017 #ifndef _VIENNACL_KERNEL_HPP_
00018 #define _VIENNACL_KERNEL_HPP_

00020 #ifdef __APPLE__
00021 #include <OpenCL/cl.h>
00022 #else
00023 #include <CL/cl.h>

00026 #include "viennacl/ocl/handle.hpp"
00027 #include "viennacl/ocl/program.hpp"
00028 #include "viennacl/ocl/device.hpp"

00030 
00031 namespace viennacl
00032 {
00033   namespace ocl
00034   {
00035     class kernel
00036     {
00037     public:
00038       kernel() : _init_done(false) {}
00039       //kernel(const handle<cl_kernel> & _kernel_handle) : h(_kernel_handle) {}
00040       
00041       void prepareInit(const char * name, program const & prog)
00042       {
00043         if (!_init_done)
00044         {
00045           _name = name;
00046           _program = prog;
00047         }
00048         else
00049           std::cout << "WARNING: Kernel " << _name << " already initialized, cannot assign new name '" << name << "' and program." << std::endl;
00050       }
00051       
00052       void setArgument(unsigned int pos, unsigned long val)
00053       {
00054         init();
00055         #ifdef VCL_BUILD_INFO
00056         //std::cout << "Setting unsigned long kernel argument at pos " << pos << " for kernel " << _name << std::endl;
00057         #endif
00058         setArgument(pos, static_cast<unsigned int>(val));
00059       }
00060 
00061       template<class TYPE>
00062       void setArgument(unsigned int pos, TYPE val)
00063       {
00064         init();
00065         #ifdef VCL_BUILD_INFO
00066         //std::cout << "Setting TYPE kernel argument at pos " << pos << " for kernel " << _name << std::endl;
00067         #endif
00068         cl_int err = clSetKernelArg(h, pos, sizeof(TYPE), (void*)&val);
00069         CL_ERR_CHECK(err);
00070       }
00071 
00072       void setArgument(unsigned int pos, const handle<cl_mem> & val)
00073       {
00074         init();
00075         #ifdef VCL_BUILD_INFO
00076         //std::cout << "Setting cl_mem kernel argument at pos " << pos << " for kernel " << _name << std::endl;
00077         #endif
00078         cl_int err = clSetKernelArg(h, pos, sizeof(cl_mem), (void*)&val.get());
00079         CL_ERR_CHECK(err);
00080       }
00081 
00082       void setLocalBuffer(unsigned int pos, unsigned int size)
00083       {
00084         init();
00085         #ifdef VCL_BUILD_INFO
00086         //std::cout << "Setting local buffer kernel argument at pos " << pos << " for kernel " << _name << std::endl;
00087         #endif
00088         cl_int err = clSetKernelArg(h, pos, size, 0);
00089         CL_ERR_CHECK(err);
00090       }
00091       
00092       void start1D()
00093       {
00094         start1D(device().work_groups() * device().work_items_per_group(),
00095                 device().work_items_per_group());
00096       }
00097 
00098       void start1D(const unsigned int & global_work_size)
00099       {
00100         #ifdef VCL_BUILD_INFO
00101         std::cout << "Starting kernel '" << _name << "'..." << std::endl;
00102         #endif
00103         size_t tmp = global_work_size;
00104         cl_int err = clEnqueueNDRangeKernel(device().queue(), h, 1, NULL, &tmp, NULL, 0, NULL, NULL);
00105         CL_ERR_CHECK(err);
00106         //assert(err == CL_SUCCESS);
00107       }
00108       void start1D(const unsigned int & global_work_size, const unsigned int & local_work_size)
00109       {
00110         #ifdef VCL_BUILD_INFO
00111         std::cout << "Starting kernel '" << _name << "'..." << std::endl;
00112         #endif
00113         size_t tmp_global = global_work_size;
00114         size_t tmp_local = local_work_size;
00115         cl_int err = clEnqueueNDRangeKernel(device().queue(), h, 1, NULL, &tmp_global, &tmp_local, 0, NULL, NULL);
00116         if (err != CL_SUCCESS)
00117         {
00118           std::cerr << "Could not start kernel '" << _name << "' with global work size " << tmp_global << " and local work size " << tmp_local << "." << std::endl;
00119         }
00120         CL_ERR_CHECK(err);
00121         /*
00122         if (err != CL_SUCCESS)
00123         {
00124           //std::cout << "Flushing queue, then enqueuing again with half the size..." << std::endl;
00125           unsigned int new_global_work_size = global_work_size / 2;
00126           unsigned int new_local_work_size = local_work_size / 2;
00127           err = clEnqueueNDRangeKernel(device().command_queue(), h, 1, NULL, &new_global_work_size, &new_local_work_size, 0, NULL, NULL);
00128           if (err != CL_SUCCESS)
00129           {
00130             std::cout << "Finishing queue, then enqueuing kernel '" << _name << "' again..." << std::endl;
00131             clFlush(device().command_queue());
00132             err = clEnqueueNDRangeKernel(device().command_queue(), h, 1, NULL, &global_work_size, &local_work_size, 0, NULL, NULL);
00133             CL_ERR_CHECK(err);
00134           }
00135         } */
00136         //assert(err == CL_SUCCESS);
00137       }
00138 
00139       const handle<cl_kernel> & get()
00140       {
00141         init();
00142         return h; 
00143       }
00144 
00145     private:
00146       
00147       //prevent messing around with kernels:
00148       kernel(const kernel & other) {}
00149       template <typename T>
00150       void operator=(T other) {}
00151       
00152       void create_kernel()
00153       {
00154         cl_int err;
00155         #ifdef VCL_BUILD_INFO
00156         std::cout << "Building " << _name << std::endl;
00157         #endif
00158         h = clCreateKernel(_program.get(), _name.c_str(), &err);
00159         
00160         if (err != CL_SUCCESS)
00161         {
00162           std::cerr << "Could not build kernel '" << _name << "'." << std::endl;
00163           #ifdef VIENNACL_EXPERIMENTAL_DOUBLE_PRECISION_WITH_STREAM_SDK_ON_GPU
00164           if (_name.find("norm") != std::string::npos)
00165             std::cerr << "You seem to be using one of the functions norm_1, norm_2, norm_inf and index_norm_inf, which are not available on ATI GPUs! This also affects the GMRES solver." << std::endl;
00166           #endif
00167         }
00168         
00169         CL_ERR_CHECK(err);
00170       }
00171 
00172       void init()
00173       {
00174         if (!_init_done)
00175         {
00176           create_kernel();
00177           _init_done = true;
00178         }
00179       }
00180 
00181       handle<cl_kernel> h;
00182       program _program;
00183       std::string _name;
00184       std::string _source;
00185       bool _init_done;
00186     };
00187     
00188   } //namespace ocl
00189 } //namespace viennacl
00190 
00191 #endif
